title: Is California’s New Law Doomsday for College Sports? Come on.
text:
This week California passed its college sports “Fair Pay to Play Act”—Gov. Gavin Newsom signed the bill into law, right there on LeBron James’s barbershop talk show, “The Shop,” and, as far as I can tell, the rivers and seas did not boil, the dead did not rise, and cats and dogs did not start living together.

What’s happening in California has yet to unleash the apocalypse Bill Murray grimly outlined in “Ghostbusters.” It won’t even whirl into action until 2023, three whole years from now—by then, it’s possible we may be...
description: California’s “Fair Pay to Play Act” got a lot of hype, but this is not The End of College Sports As We Know Them.
